tasks.title: Project Setup and File Organization
tasks.description: Separate monolithic assets file into individual focused documents and establish project structure
tasks.details: Successfully separated website_project_assets_and_templates.md into individual files: pitch-email.md, contract-skeleton.md, quote-breakdown.md, intake-questionnaire.md, google-form-fields.md, and ai-prompts.md. Created memory bank structure with core documentation files.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all files are properly separated and contain correct content. Check that memory bank files are complete and follow established patterns.

tasks.title: Memory Bank Initialization
tasks.description: Initialize comprehensive memory bank with project documentation and context
tasks.details: Created core memory bank files: projectbrief.md, productContext.md, systemPatterns.md, techContext.md, activeContext.md, and progress.md. Established documentation hierarchy and project intelligence system.
tasks.testStrategy: Review all memory bank files for completeness and accuracy. Ensure they provide comprehensive project context.

tasks.title: Taskmaster Integration Setup
tasks.description: Initialize Taskmaster project management system and create initial task structure
tasks.details: Initialized Taskmaster with Cursor rules profile. Created PRD document and established task management structure. Set up project root and configuration.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify Taskmaster is properly initialized and can manage tasks. Test task creation and status updates.

tasks.title: Current HTML Code Review
tasks.description: Analyze existing portfolio website HTML code to identify strengths, weaknesses, and improvement opportunities
tasks.details: Review portfolio_website_index.html for code quality, performance, accessibility, and user experience. Identify specific areas for improvement and document findings.
tasks.testStrategy: Test HTML in multiple browsers and devices. Check for accessibility issues, performance problems, and responsive design issues.

subtasks.title: HTML Code Analysis Complete
subtasks.details:
**COMPREHENSIVE HTML CODE REVIEW COMPLETED**

## Overall Assessment
The portfolio website has a solid technical foundation but requires significant content updates and improvements to be functional. It's currently a well-structured template with placeholder content.

## Key Findings

### STRENGTHS ‚úÖ
- **Clean HTML5 Structure**: Proper semantic elements and logical organization
- **Modern CSS**: Good use of CSS Grid, Flexbox, and custom properties
- **Responsive Design**: Mobile-first approach with responsive breakpoints
- **Performance**: Minimal dependencies, single HTTP request
- **Professional Design**: Clean dark theme with good visual hierarchy
- **Progressive Enhancement**: Core functionality works without JavaScript

### CRITICAL ISSUES ‚ùå
- **100% Placeholder Content**: All text, images, and contact info needs replacement
- **Non-functional Forms**: Google Forms URLs are placeholders
- **Generic Branding**: "[Your Name]" and "WB" logo throughout
- **Missing Real Portfolio**: Using Unsplash placeholder images
- **No Contact Information**: Placeholder email addresses

### TECHNICAL IMPROVEMENTS NEEDED üîß
- **Accessibility**: Missing ARIA labels, focus indicators, skip navigation
- **SEO**: No meta keywords, Open Graph tags, or structured data
- **Performance**: No image optimization, lazy loading, or minification
- **Mobile UX**: Could use hamburger menu and better mobile navigation
- **Error Handling**: No fallbacks for external resources or JavaScript failures

## Priority Action Items
1. **HIGH**: Replace all placeholder content with real business information
2. **HIGH**: Set up actual Google Forms integration
3. **HIGH**: Add real portfolio images and examples
4. **MEDIUM**: Improve accessibility and SEO compliance
5. **MEDIUM**: Add performance optimizations
6. **LOW**: Enhance mobile responsiveness and add more breakpoints

## Code Quality Score: 7/10
- Structure: 8/10
- Performance: 6/10
- Accessibility: 5/10
- Content: 2/10 (all placeholders)
- Mobile: 7/10

tasks.title: Content Audit and Cyberpunk Theme Implementation
tasks.description: Replace placeholder content with cyberpunk/space theme and implement design system
tasks.details: Replace placeholder content with cyberpunk/space theme. Implement cosmic color palette, 3D elements, and space/robot dream content. Update business name, services descriptions, portfolio examples, and contact details with futuristic presentation.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all placeholder content has been replaced with cosmic theme. Check that 3D elements work properly. Ensure contact information is correct and design system is applied consistently.

subtasks.title: Collaborative Theme Development
subtasks.description: Work together with reishi to create and refine the cyberpunk/space theme through iterative collaboration
subtasks.details:
**COLLABORATIVE THEME DEVELOPMENT APPROACH**

Instead of implementing a pre-defined cyberpunk/space theme, we'll work together to create and refine the design through iterative collaboration. This ensures the final theme truly represents reishi's unique vision and personality.

**Process:**
1. Start with basic HTML structure and current content
2. Collaborate on color palette and visual elements
3. Iteratively refine the design together
4. Test and adjust based on feedback
5. Finalize theme that feels authentic to reishi's brand

**Benefits:**
- More personalized and authentic design
- Real-time feedback and adjustments
- Better alignment with reishi's vision
- Collaborative creative process

tasks.title: Design System Implementation
tasks.description: Implement cyberpunk/space design system with 3D elements and cosmic color palette
tasks.details: Implement cosmic color palette, 3D CSS transforms, and selective Three.js elements. Apply cyberpunk styling to all components. Ensure mobile performance while maintaining desktop wow factor.
tasks.testStrategy: Test 3D elements on various devices. Verify color palette is applied consistently. Check performance on mobile and desktop. Ensure graceful degradation for older browsers.

tasks.title: Google Forms Integration Setup
tasks.description: Create and configure Google Forms for order inquiries and integrate with cyberpunk styling
tasks.details: Create Google Forms based on intake questionnaire. Configure form fields for business info, project requirements, budget, and contact details. Update website with actual form URLs and cyberpunk styling.
tasks.testStrategy: Test form submission process. Verify all form fields work correctly and submissions are received. Test form validation and error handling. Ensure cyberpunk styling is applied.

tasks.title: Portfolio Images and Media Optimization
tasks.description: Gather, optimize, and integrate high-quality portfolio images and space-themed media assets
tasks.details: Replace Unsplash placeholder images with real portfolio work and space-themed imagery. Optimize images for web performance. Ensure responsive image loading and proper alt text.
tasks.testStrategy: Test image loading performance. Verify images display correctly on all devices. Check alt text for accessibility. Ensure space theme is consistent.

tasks.title: Mobile Responsiveness Enhancement
tasks.description: Ensure perfect mobile experience across all device sizes and orientations with 3D elements
tasks.details: Test and improve mobile responsiveness. Optimize touch interactions, navigation, and content layout for mobile devices. Ensure 3D elements work well on mobile with performance optimization.
tasks.testStrategy: Test on various mobile devices and screen sizes. Check touch interactions, scrolling, and form usability on mobile. Verify 3D elements perform well on mobile.

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize website performance for fast loading times and smooth 3D experience
tasks.details: Optimize CSS, JavaScript, and images for performance. Implement lazy loading, minification, and other performance best practices. Target < 3 second load time mobile, < 3 seconds desktop.
tasks.testStrategy: Use performance testing tools to measure load times. Test on various connection speeds and devices. Verify 3D elements don't impact performance.

tasks.title: SEO and Accessibility Improvements
tasks.description: Implement SEO best practices and ensure accessibility compliance with cyberpunk theme
tasks.details: Add proper meta tags, structured data, and semantic HTML. Implement accessibility features like proper heading hierarchy, alt text, and keyboard navigation. Ensure cyberpunk theme is accessible.
tasks.testStrategy: Use SEO and accessibility testing tools. Verify compliance with WCAG guidelines and search engine requirements.

tasks.title: Analytics and Tracking Setup
tasks.description: Implement Google Analytics and conversion tracking for monitoring website performance
tasks.details: Set up Google Analytics tracking. Implement conversion tracking for form submissions. Add event tracking for user interactions and engagement metrics.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify analytics tracking is working correctly. Test conversion tracking and event monitoring.

tasks.title: Cross-Browser Testing and Compatibility
tasks.description: Test website functionality across different browsers and ensure 3D compatibility
tasks.details: Test website in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. Ensure all features work correctly across browsers. Test 3D elements and fix any compatibility issues.
tasks.testStrategy: Test all functionality in each browser. Verify consistent appearance and behavior across platforms. Test 3D elements on different browsers.

tasks.title: GitHub Pages Deployment Setup
tasks.description: Configure GitHub Pages deployment and set up automatic deployment workflow
tasks.details: Set up GitHub repository and configure GitHub Pages hosting. Implement automatic deployment from main branch. Configure custom domain if needed.
tasks.testStrategy: Test deployment process. Verify website is accessible and functions correctly on GitHub Pages.

tasks.title: Documentation and Handoff Preparation
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation for maintenance and future updates
tasks.details: Create maintenance documentation, update guides, and handoff materials. Document all customizations and configurations for future reference.
tasks.testStrategy: Review documentation for completeness and accuracy. Ensure it's understandable for non-technical users.

tasks.title: Final Testing and Launch
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive final testing and launch the cyberpunk portfolio website
tasks.details: Perform final comprehensive testing of all features and functionality. Launch website and monitor for any issues. Prepare for client handoff.
tasks.testStrategy: Complete end-to-end testing of all user flows. Verify all features work as expected in production environment.

metadata.description: Tasks for master context - Cyberpunk Portfolio Website
